name: EscapeVr
description:
EscapeVr is a fantastic adventure with unique gameplay, where exploration, action and research mix into an extraordinary experience that tests the limits of your performance.

Feel the evil in the darkness of a scary apartment and find a way out before the police arrive and find you together with a dead body.

Everything you find in this world is designed for absolute realism, so think logically ...

  • Play EscapeVr and use your extraordinary skills to advance in adventure.
  • Investigate an abandoned apartment for clues and suspects.
  • Absolutely realistic environment.
